extends RandU01Ifc, RandomStreamIfc, GetStreamCloneIfc, GetAntitheticStreamIfc

Represents a random number generator with streams

Author:
rossetti
 

Method Summary
 int randInt(int i, int j)
          Returns a (pseudo)random number from the discrete uniform distribution over the integers {i, i + 1, . . . , j }, using this stream.

Method Detail

randInt

int randInt(int i,
            int j)
Returns a (pseudo)random number from the discrete uniform distribution over the integers {i, i + 1, . . . , j }, using this stream. Calls randU01 once.

Parameters:
i - start of range
j - end of range
Returns:
The integer pseudo random number
